## mapResults() function

Aggregates successful result values from a collection of [Result&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function mapResults<T>(results: Iterable<Result<T>>, aggregatedErrors?: IMessageAggregator): Result<T[]>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

results


</td><td>

Iterable&lt;[Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;


</td><td>

The collection of [Result&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.result.md) to be mapped.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

aggregatedErrors


</td><td>

[IMessageAggregator](./ts-utils.imessageaggregator.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional string array to which any error messages will be appended. Each error is appended as an individual string.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;T\[\]&gt;

If all [results](./ts-utils.result.md) are successful, returns [Success](./ts-utils.success.md) with an array containing all returned values. If any [results](./ts-utils.result.md) failed, returns [Failure](./ts-utils.failure.md) with a concatenated summary of all error messages.
